name: 黃乾怡
objective:
本課程討論利用統計方法進行品質管制，品管方法將運用於市場、設計、採購、生產與檢測。此外，並介紹如何利用全面品管建立並維持高效率之企業組織，以六標準
This course provides a fundamental understanding of statistical quality control concept. Areas for quality implementation will include functions such as marketing, design, purchasing, production, inspection, etc. This class also enables the students to recognize the foundation to create and sustain an effective organization through total quality management.
schedule:
1. Introduction to quality
2. Total quality management – principle and practice
3~4. Total quality management – tools and techniques
5~6. Fundamental of statistics
7. Control charts for variables
8. Control charts for attributes
9. Midterm Exam
10. Lot by acceptance sampling by attribute
11. Acceptance sampling systems
12~13. Reliability
14. Electronics quality & reliability (Invited speaker from industry)
15~17. Term report
18. Final Exam
materials: Quality Control; D. Besterfield; Pearson Education; 2009
